allow:
Bash(bd create "Phase 11: History Dashboards & Match Analytics" --type=epic --priority=1 --description="$\(cat <<''EOF''
Build history dashboards and match analytics to help coaches review past matches, analyze performance trends, and make data-driven decisions.

## Goals
1. Match History View - Display list of completed matches with key stats
2. Match Recap Screen - Detailed breakdown of single match with set-by-set analysis
3. Set Dashboard - Live and historical set statistics with visual summaries
4. Season Dashboard - Aggregate statistics across multiple matches with filters
5. Basic Analytics - Key performance indicators \(KPIs\) and trends

## Success Criteria
- Coaches can view all completed matches
- Match recap shows comprehensive statistics
- Season dashboard displays aggregate statistics
- Filters work correctly \(date range, opponent\)
- Analytics calculations are accurate
- Performance <2s load time for match list
- Works offline \(cached match summaries\)

## Dependencies
- Assumes matches are being saved to Supabase after completion
- May need to enhance rally capture for proper match completion
- RLS policies must allow coaches to view their own match data

## Reference
See agent-docs/active/todos/phase-11-plan.md for full specification
EOF
\)" --silent)
